title: [Extension Proposal] Quarkus Data Files

labels.name: area/quarkiverse
labels.description: This issue/PR is part of the Quarkiverse organization

body:
### Description

Interested in this extension, please +1 via the emoji/reaction feature of GitHub (top right).

It should allow to declare yml/json files in a src/main/resources/data
They will be accessible through CDI
And we should allow to have strongly typed (record) either generated or manually implemented a bit like entities in panache

### Repository name

quarkus-data-files

### Short description

Allow to inject yml/json files and use their content in services or templates.

### Repository Homepage URL

https://quarkiverse.github.io/quarkiverse-docs/quarkus-data-files/dev/
